TopicTitle: Is there anything interesting to see at Kerbin's South Pole?

Articles.Content:
So Jebediah is sitting in a jet nearly out of fuel, at the South Pole. If there's something for me to go find, I can send a refueling mission with a rover for him to use.

If there's nothing there, I can send a simple refueling mission (for the practice) or just retrieve him from the Space Center and save myself some time.

Any point of ending a rover to him?

Thanks.

Edited July 30, 2013 by corpsdog
Changed Prefix to Answered
I had a base at the south pole with in 0.19 with a rover and all but never found a thing besides snow.
Thank you. I'll just retrieve him later, I think (maybe do a fuel run.)
